alert.note: Alert for Butler; Sedgwick (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 4:12AM CDT until July 05 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SEDGWICK AND SOUTHWESTERN BUTLER COUNTIES... At 412 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Andover, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wichita, El Dorado, Andover, Augusta, Park City, Bel Aire, Towanda, Benton, Leon, Downtown Wichita, Kechi, Eastborough, East Wichita, Northeast Wichita, Mcconnell Air Force Base, Santa Fe Lake, El Dorado State Park, Augusta Municipal Airport, El Dorado Airport and El Dorado Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
